items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So stylish ! Very long and runs small
items.body: Super cute and great fit. VERY LONG ! I bought a 4 and 6 because I needed something stat! I didn’t realize they were velvet , because I had gotten this same dress from Nordstrom is a scuba material in 2 - but they were sold out. If you need something for Winter this is comfy and sexy. Read more
items.author: AmyBuerkHallock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Comfortable and fit true to size! The asymmetric shoulder and cuts make it more interesting than the average black gown. It was a little long even with heels (I’m 5’4” and wore 3” heels), so I cut it and had to hem it by hand because I couldn’t figure out how to sew velvet on my sewing machine and I didn’t have time to get it altered. Read more
items.author: aaonthego

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and classy!
items.body: I ended up returning due to no longer needing for the event but wished I could have kept it. This dress is very well made with weight to it that makes it feel like great quality. If you’re looking for elegant and classy, you’ve found it! Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and comfortable
items.body: Very comfortable and has a very nice elegant look and feel. Im 5ft 6 inches and with a higher heel the front is just short enough that I don’t trip. I tried a few different dresses and this one left me feeling like it was made for my body. Definitely excited to wear to an event and save for a formal gala in the future. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beauty in Black!
items.body: This dress fits like a glove! I love the way it feels against my skin. I was clearly the best dressed person at the black tie event! Thank you!! Read more
items.author: Lynda Tyson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress
items.body: This fits true to size. It is form fitting, but not uncomfortably tight in the wrong places. I’m 5’7” 155 pounds and I ordered a 10 which I typically wear an 8, but I figured this would be form fitting and that just makes me feel uncomfortable. It has a small train which makes it even more elegant. I will need some heels for sure, so if you are rather short, it will likely be too long for you. Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really large
items.body: Beautiful dress. Size down! Read more
items.author: Hayes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable, and stretchy!!!
items.body: More than pleased with this dress. I had seen it on Macy’s website and was so surprised to find it on Amazon, and in velvet no less! I wore this for a December wedding and it was the perfect weight and warmth. The fabric is stretchy and form fitting. A very flattering fit. Read more
items.author: Rose

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
